subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sasha Vujucic scored 19 points and Lamar Odom added 17 points and 16 rebounds as the Los Angeles Lakers beat the host Chicago Bulls, 103-91, on Tuesday night.
snippet: Sasha Vujucic scored 19 points and Lamar Odom added 17 points and 16 rebounds as the Los Angeles Lakers beat the host Chicago Bulls, 103-91, on Tuesday night.
